Ingredients: Pasta, Tomato Sauce, Cheese, Mushrooms, Ground Beef
Preparation Instructions: Layer the tomato sauce, cheese, mushrooms, and ground beef between the pasta, bake for 30 minutes at 375F

Ingredients: Pizza Dough, Tomato Sauce, Cheese, Pepperoni
Preparation Instructions: Spread tomato sauce and cheese on pizza dough, add pepperoni, bake for 15 minutes at 425F

Ingredients: Burger Bun, Patty, Lettuce, Tomato, Cheese
Preparation Instructions: Grill patty, place between burger buns with lettuce, tomato, and cheese
